models.categories: Four skill categories representing different dimensions of product work.

skills.title: Discovery & User Research
skills.description: Talked to 20+ engineers before building PrepGPT. Ran discovery sessions at Rivo, mapped end-to-end workflows, found 4 critical handoff gaps. PRDs came after understanding real friction.

skills.title: PRDs & Roadmapping
skills.description: Wrote PRDs targeting gaps first. Set phased roadmaps (visibility → reliability → productivity → AI) to sequence releases without overloading teams.

skills.title: Prioritization & Scoping
skills.description: Faced timeline pressure for more features. Recognized only core flow would move conversion. Cut scope to essentials, shipped on time.

skills.title: A/B Testing & Journey Mapping
skills.description: Found retention drop-off was concentrated in onboarding at HealthifyMe. Redesigned flow to get users to first value faster. 15% retention lift.

skills.title: RAG Systems
skills.description: Built PrepGPT with RAG for retrieval. Made explicit build vs buy decisions on each component to ship faster.

skills.title: LLM Integration
skills.description: Designed AskRivo, an AI chatbot that walks users through rent vs buy tradeoff before pushing products — addressing the real decision blocker upstream.

skills.title: Agents & Eval Loops
skills.description: PrepGPT used agents for conversational practice and eval loops for personalized feedback. Session recordings confirmed users returned for feedback, not content.

skills.title: Embeddings
skills.description: Hands-on experience with embeddings for semantic search and matching. Built systems where AI reduces cognitive load and removes repetition.

skills.title: Python & Django
skills.description: Core backend stack. Built reliable systems at HealthifyMe and Attentive OS. Work close to systems and data flows to make grounded product decisions.

skills.title: SQL · Redis · MySQL
skills.description: Led Redis caching and MySQL partitioning at HealthifyMe. 4x faster response times, 10% cloud cost reduction. 80% of gains with 20% of effort.

skills.title: AWS & Microservices
skills.description: Production experience with AWS infrastructure. Prefer simple, predictable architectures that scale without unnecessary complexity.

skills.title: APIs & Integrations
skills.description: Drove API integration decisions at Attentive OS. Shipped proposal engine that became a key selling point.

skills.title: Cross-Functional Alignment
skills.description: Engineering, design, and sales were building independent mental models at Attentive. Instituted weekly syncs. Sales started selling what we were actually building.

skills.title: Stakeholder Management
skills.description: Faced timeline pressure from stakeholders pushing for more features. Recognized what would actually impact conversion. Delivered what specialists needed.

skills.title: Mentorship
skills.description: Mentored 4 engineers at Attentive OS. Connected technical execution to measurable business value across teams.

skills.title: 0→1 Ownership
skills.description: Co-founded PrepGPT. First PM at Rivo. Built Shift Management from pitch to production. I thrive when the playbook doesn't exist yet.
